plugin.title: Burst Music App Plugin
plugin.author: Burst Development
plugin.description: This plugin adds in extra security to the JW Player when loading in external files. The plugin requires lighttpd's mod_secdownload with a security key along with a PHP server-side script to get the server's time in order to create an appropriate mod_secdownload link.

flashvar.name: xid
flashvar.description: Contains the ID of the song to retrieve the data from.
